movies.title: Heavy Petting
movies.plot: When Charlie meets Daphne - the girl of his dreams - he never expects he'll have to battle past her pet dog "Babydoll" to woo her. And just when it seems he can't beat the beast and all is lost, something unexpected happens: Charlie begins to fall in love with the dog himself, realizing he never really needed a girlfriend in the first place. Now, in order to keep hanging out with "man's best friend", Charlie must scramble to keep the relationship with Daphne going at all costs - or risk losing them both.
movies.simplePlot: When Charlie meets Daphne - the girl of his dreams - he never expects he'll have to battle past her pet dog "Babydoll" to woo her. And just when it seems he can't beat the beast and all is ...

biography.bio: Malin was born in Stockholm, Sweden and raised in Toronto, Canada. Her mother, Pia (Sundström), is a model and aerobics instructor, and her father, Magnus Åkerman, is an insurance broker. They moved to Toronto when she was age 2. At age 5, she began appearing in TV commercials. Her parents divorced when she was 6 and her father returned to Sweden. At age 17, she won the Canadian title of Ford Supermodel. This enabled her to spend 3 years as a catwalk model in Europe. She decided to become a child psychologist and enrolled in York University but she was offered a guest role in Invasion planète Terre (1997) so she turned her attention back to acting. She moved to Los Angeles in 2001 and won roles in both TV and film. Her breakthrough role came when she was cast as Silk Spectre II in Watchmen (2009).
biography.name: Malin Akerman

biography.bio: Brendan Hines is an American actor and singer-songwriter. He was born in Baltimore, Maryland to a former nun and a former priest who became Philosophy professors. He began playing the trombone when he was 11 but gave it up for the guitar seven years later. Brendan attended Loyola High School where he performed in the Jazz Ensemble and appeared in several plays including 'Sweeney Todd' and Moliere's 'The Miser'. He moved to New York where he continued to work in the theater until being cast in his first feature, the 2001 independent film 'Ordinary Sinner'. Brendan has since appeared in a number of films and television shows including 'Terminator:The Sarah Connor Chronicles', 'The Middleman', 'Lie To Me' and 'Scandal'. In Spring 2011, Brendan returned to the stage to play Pip and Theo in South Coast Repertory's production of Richard Greenberg's 'Three Days of Rain'. He has written, recorded and released two folk albums; 2007's "Good For You Know Who" and 2012's "Small Mistakes". His song "Miss New York" was featured in the film 'Happythankyoumoreplease'.
biography.name: Brendan Hines

biography.bio: Mike Doyle is an actor and producer, known for The Invitation (2015), Jersey Boys (2014) and Green Lantern (2011).
biography.name: Mike Doyle

biography.bio: Juan Carlos Hernández is an actor and director, known for Cop Out (2010), In America (2002) and Tower Heist (2011). He has been married to Adria K. Hernandez since July 22, 1998. They have one child.
biography.name: Juan Carlos Hernández

biography.bio: Sam Coppola was born on July 31, 1935 in Jersey City, New Jersey, USA. He is known for his work on Saturday Night Fever (1977), Fatal Attraction (1987) and Jacob's Ladder (1990). He was married to Helen Shinnick. He died on February 5, 2012 in Leonia, New Jersey.
biography.name: Sam Coppola

biography.bio: Allie Woods Jr. was born on September 28, 1940 in Houston, Texas, USA. He is known for his work on Tower Heist (2011), Be Kind Rewind (2008) and Before We Go (2014).
biography.name: Allie Woods Jr.

biography.placeOfBirth: Staten Island, New York City, New York, USA
biography.bio: Kevin Sussman was born on December 4, 1970 in Staten Island, New York City, New York, USA. He is an actor, known for A.I. Artificial Intelligence (2001), Burn After Reading (2008) and Hitch (2005).
biography.name: Kevin Sussman

biography.bio: Shayna Ferm is an actress and composer, known for Heavy Petting (2007), Cherry Pop (2016) and Early Edition (1996).

biography.bio: Martha Millan is an actress, known for The OA (2016), My Dead Boyfriend (2016) and Entourage (2004).
biography.name: Martha Millan

biography.bio: Martin Pfefferkorn is an actor, known for World Trade Center (2006), I Sell the Dead (2008) and The Book of Life (1998).
biography.name: Martin Pfefferkorn

biography.bio: Karen Shallo was born on September 28, 1946 in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, USA. She is an actress, known for Il était une fois en Amérique (1984), Center Stage (2000) and Big Night (1996).
biography.name: Karen Shallo

biography.name: Sohpie Sarmiento

biography.bio: Krysten Ritter stars as Jessica Jones in the Peabody, Hugo, and Emmy Award winning Netflix original series, "Marvel's Jessica Jones." Her performance, which earned her a prestigious Critics Choice nomination, a Saturn nomination, a Webby Award and a Glamour Best International TV Actress Award, has received rave reviews with the show being celebrated by critics and audiences alike for it's groundbreaking depiction of a reluctant anti-super-heroine with an alcohol problem and a wicked case of PTSD: who will not let a sexual assault from her past define her. She will also play Jessica Jones in "Marvel's Defenders" and the second season of "Marvel's Jessica Jones". Additional acting roles include her critically acclaimed turn as Jane Margolis on AMC's hit series, "Breaking Bad", the titular character in the cult favorite "Don't Trust the B-- in Apartment 23", "Big Eyes" directed by Tim Burton, indie darling "Listen Up Phillip", "Life Happens" which she co-wrote and co-produced, as well as roles in "Veronica Mars", "The Blacklist", "Confessions of a Shopaholic", and "She's Out of My League." Growing up in a small-town farm in rural Pennsylvania, Ritter started her career in front of the camera as a model at 15-years-old. Her body of work has subsequently spanned film, television, theatre, writing, producing, music, and fashion design. In 2012, Ritter launched her production company Silent Machine where she juggles many projects in various stages of development, always with the objective of highlighting complex female protagonists. Ritter and her dog Mikey split their time between New York and Los Angeles.
biography.name: Krysten Ritter

biography.bio: Shawand McKenzie was born on July 3, 1980 in Brooklyn, New York, USA. She is an actress, known for Take the Lead (2006), Heavy Petting (2007) and Peace After Marriage (2013).
biography.name: Shawand McKenzie
